snippet.title: Mine & Slash - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Embark on an epic quest in this roguelite RPG where you explore dungeons, mine for gold, and battle fierce foes. Upgrade your gear, face daunting bosses, and uncover hidden treasures. Customize your hero with powerful loot and master new skills for endless adventure and surprises!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/3417900/Mine__Slash
